tool_description: Manages user content preferences, viewing history, and personalization settings for recommendation algorithms.

disliked_genres.description: List of genres to avoid in recommendations

content_types.description: Preferred content types: movies, series, documentaries, kids

release_year_min.description: Minimum release year for content preferences

release_year_max.description: Maximum release year for content preferences

rating_threshold.description: Minimum content rating for recommendations (1-10 scale)

exclude_watched.description: Whether to exclude already watched content from recommendations

error_messages: Profile not found: The specified profile_id does not exist.
Invalid genre: One or more specified genres are not recognized.
Invalid content type: Use valid types [movies, series, documentaries, kids].
Invalid year range: release_year_min must be less than release_year_max.
Invalid rating threshold: Rating must be between 1 and 10.
Language not supported: One or more specified languages are not supported.
usage: Provide profile_id and any combination of preference parameters to update user content preferences. These settings will influence content recommendations.

recommendation_score.description: Profile completeness score for better recommendations
